abilities.name: Slip-Slip Defense
abilities.description: Makes the user's body extremely smooth and slippery, causing most attacks and objects to slide harmlessly off their skin.

abilities.name: Cosmetic Transformation
abilities.description: As a permanent side effect, all of the user's excess body fat 'slips off', resulting in a slender physique and beautiful appearance.

weaknesses.description: User cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Sea-Prism Stone.

reveals.information: The Sube Sube no Mi makes everything slip off the user's smooth skin
The fruit causes all excess fat to slip off the user's body, permanently transforming their appearance
Alvida ate this Devil Fruit between Episodes 2 and 46

trivia.fact: The Sube Sube no Mi is the first Devil Fruit shown in One Piece to have a permanent cosmetic side effect on the user's physical appearance.

sources.title: Sube Sube no Mi - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: This fruit has one of the longest gaps between when its power was first demonstrated (Episode 46) and when the actual fruit was shown in the series (over 20 years later in the manga).
